about.title: About
about.intro: Frontend Developer with 10 years of experience specializing in modern, scalable web interfaces. Skilled in React, Angular, and Vue, with a focus on designing robust, high-performance architectures. I combine technical expertise with attention to detail and industry best practices to deliver exceptional results. Passionate about solving complex challenges and collaborating with teams to create innovative digital products. Always striving to exceed expectations in every project.

highlights: Development of front-end architectures for financial applications
Analysis and resolution of technical debt
Documentation of reusable components with Storybook
Implementation of automated tests with Cypress
Development, refactoring and maintenance of projects and landing pages
Focus on responsive development and Mobile First
Build configuration using tools like Webpack and Gulp
Interface creation using Handlebars and Nunjucks
Application of practices to improve SEO and performance
Development of web applications focused on SEO and performance
Creation of custom themes and WordPress integrations
